body:
All Versions

  • Comparison Networks: Overlap quadrant in Comparison Results is a bar chart when more than one Comparison Network is used. The top 2 networks where the base network has the greatest advantage are displayed.
  • Comparison Networks: Overlap Details page initially displays a bar chart of Overlap with Each Network when more than one Comparison Network is used. Overlap with All Networks venn diagram tab is still available.
  • Comparison Networks: Export does not include Overlap By Provider Type Details (venn diagrams) when more than one Comparison Network is used.
  • Rank Networks: Expanded width of Client name dropdown.
  • Rank Networks: Fixed alignment of navigation.
  • Data Vintage: All columns can be sorted.
  • Manage Users: Additional date ranges to searches in Top Clients, Top Activities and Top Users.
